content: Can you provide a list of wedding dresses suitable for a summer outdoor ceremony? Please include the following details in an Excel table: dress name, designer, fabric, neckline, sleeve style, and price range. Thank you!

Sure! Below is a list of wedding dresses suitable for a summer outdoor ceremony. I've included details such as the dress name, designer, fabric, neckline, sleeve style, and price range. You can easily convert this information into an Excel table:

| Dress Name         | Designer        | Fabric       | Neckline    | Sleeve Style    | Price Range   |
|--------------------|-----------------|--------------|-------------|-----------------|---------------|
| Summer Breeze      | Vera Wang       | Chiffon      | V-neck      | Sleeveless      | $2,000 - $3,500|
| Sunlit Elegance    | Oscar de la Renta| Organza     | Sweetheart  | Cap Sleeves     | $3,000 - $5,000|
| Garden Romance     | Jenny Packham   | Lace         | Illusion    | Short Sleeves   | $2,500 - $4,000|
| Floral Dream       | Monique Lhuillier| Tulle       | Halter      | Strapless       | $4,000 - $6,500|
| Beach Blossom      | Marchesa        | Silk         | Off-the-Shoulder | Long Sleeves| $3,500 - $5,500|
| Sunny Affair       | Reem Acra       | Crepe        | Square      | Sleeveless      | $4,500 - $7,000|
| Meadow Muse        | Pronovias       | Satin        | Boat        | Cap Sleeves     | $2,000 - $4,000|

Feel free to adjust the details and format it as needed in Excel. Let me know if you need any more information!
